Nude sunbathing is only allowed on certain beaches.
Compare naked NOT COVERED being the colour of skin: nude lipstick Thesaurus: synonyms and related words Not wearing or removing clothes altogether bare bare naked idiom barefoot bareheaded commando fling immodest immodesty in shirtsleeves idiom in the buff idiom in the raw idiom revealing shirtsleeve shuck shuck sth off slip streaker throw sth off undressed See more results You can also find related words, phrases, and synonyms in the topics: Colour general words The skin, skin colour Want to learn more?

nude noun uk Your browser doesn't support HTML5 audio /njuːd/ us Your browser doesn't support HTML5 audio /nuːd/ picture or other piece of art showing person who is not wearing any clothes: The exhibition includes several superb nudes.
in the nude not wearing any clothes: The toddlers were running around the garden in the nude.
